Hi, I'm Adam!

Software Engineer and Lifelong Learner

About Me

I'm a fullstack software developer who builds data-driven and well-architected software solutions. Currently, I'm completing my last semester at Auburn University and seeking a job opportunity for Spring 2023 onward.

Get to know me!

I am a self-motivated and detail-oriented engineer who is most content when being a productive member of a high-functioning team.

I enjoy modeling complex, real-world domains in software, particularly ones that result in interesting database structures.

I also have a strong passion for theoretical mathematics, especially cryptography and number theory. One of my primary hobbies is self-studying upper-level mathematics books.
